https://registrar.umd.edu/registration/s: Undergraduate Contact: Records and Registration Services Graduate Contact: Graduate Degree Clearance Services | Cancel Registration Students who register and later decide not to attend the University must cancel their registration before the first day of classes. See [dates and deadlines](/node/80908) for cancellation dates. Failure to cancel registration will result in financial obligation to the university even though the student does not attend class. Complete the [Cancellation of Registration Form ](/sites/default/files/2023-03/cancel-reg-form.pdf) The Cancellation of Registration form must be received by the Office of the University Registrar prior to the first day of classes since the university can honor only those requests for cancellation which are actually received by the deadline (prior to the first day of classes). - Cancellation of |
